item.title: Lifetime’s Chrisley Family Docuseries Gets Premiere Date and Trailer
item.description: The show will air over three weeks in September.

item.title: ‘P.I. Moms’ Was a Train Wreck for Lifetime. Now It’s a ‘Trainwreck’ on Netflix
item.description: The Hollywood Reporter tracked down filmmaker Phil Bowman to talk about the hit cable series that never was.

item.title: Courtney Stodden Biopic Among Lifetime’s New “Ripped From the Headlines” Films Set for September
item.description: Real-life tales inspired by the lives of Lisa Aguilar, Alina Thompson and Courtney Stodden are set to star such actors as Marilu Henner, Sam Trammel, Ashley Jones, Holly Barrett Doug Savant and more.
